CustomField.description: Contains technical information about the platform where the Log Event originated from. For example, Governor Limits from Apex, browser information from Lightning Components, or Node process details from Salesforce Functions.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Contains technical information about the platform where the Log Event originated from. For example, Governor Limits from Apex, browser information from Lightning Components, or Node process details from Salesforce Functions.
CustomField.label: Platform Information
